name: New York CheeseDessert
title: Creamy Dream Dessert
description: Smooth, rich cheeseDessert with a graham cracker crust. Finished with a drizzle of raspberry sauce.

name: Veggie Burger
title: Green Goodness Burger
description: A hearty veggie patty with fresh greens and house-made avocado sauce. Perfect for plant-based diets.

name: Mango Smoothie
title: Tropical Chill Drink
description: Refreshing mango smoothie blended with yogurt and honey. A perfect drink to cool down your day.

name: Chocolate Brownie
title: Fudgy Chocolate Treat
description: Rich and gooey chocolate brownie topped with melted chocolate chips. A heavenly Dessert for all ages.

name: Caesar Salad
title: Crisp & Creamy
description: Fresh romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan. A healthy, tasty delight.

name: Pizza Combo
title: Pizza + Wings + Drink
description: Medium pizza with 6 wings and a drink. Perfect combo for two people or a solo feast.

name: Margherita Pizza
title: Classic Cheese Delight
description: A delicious classic Margherita pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil for an authentic Italian flavor.

name: Classic Lemonade
title: Citrus Splash
description: A refreshing blend of fresh lemons, sugar, and chilled water. Perfect for a hot day.

name: Veggie Pizza
title: Garden Fresh Delight
description: Loaded with bell peppers, olives, onions, and mushrooms. A healthy and tasty vegetarian option.

name: Beef Burger

description: Grilled beef patty with lettuce, cheese, onions, and house special sauce in a toasted bun. A burger loverâ€™s dream.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
title: Cool Creamy Classic
description: Smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans. A timeless favorite.

name: Iced Coffee
title: Cold Brew Energy
description: Chilled coffee served with milk and a hint of vanilla. Wake up your senses in style.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
title: Fiery Wing Starter
description: Crispy and spicy chicken wings coated in a tangy hot sauce. A perfect start to your meal.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
title: Spicy Meat Pizza
description: Loaded with spicy pepperoni, cheese, and herbs on a crispy crust. A favorite for meat lovers.

title: Burger + Fries + Drink

description: Moist red velvet Dessert with layers of cream cheese frosting. A smooth and sweet indulgence.

title: Fresh Mint Zing

name: Double Patty Burger

description: Two juicy beef patties stacked with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and house sauce. A beast of a burger.

name: Garlic Bread
title: Cheesy Garlic Bites
description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and herbs, topped with cheese. Great with soups or pizza.

name: Greek Salad
title: Colorful Fresh Bowl
description: A mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta tossed in olive oil. Light and flavorful.

name: Crispy Chicken Burger

title: Ring of Happiness
description: Fluffy donut dipped in chocolate glaze with sprinkles. Sweet snack for anytime cravings.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
title: Sweet Berry Bliss
